    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1842</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Myths & Facts Online -The War of 1948</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mythen u. Tatsachen online - der Krieg von 1948</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mythes et faits en ligne - la guerre de 1948</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mitos & fatos em linha - a guerra de 1948</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miti & fatti in linea - la guerra di 1948</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μύθοι & γεγονότα on-line - ο πόλεμος του 1948</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mitos y hechos en línea - la guerra de 1948</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a presentation of the myths about the 1948 war, alongside the actual facts. The document contains several maps relevant to the period.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arab Israeli conflict</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">palestine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">partition</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Darstellung der Mythen über den 
Krieg 1948, neben den tatsächlichen Tatsachen. Das Dokument 
enthält einige Karten, die zur Periode relevant sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une présentation des mythes au sujet de la 
guerre 1948, à côté des faits réels. Le document contient 
plusieurs cartes concernant la période.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma apresentação dos mitos sobre a 
guerra 1948, ao lado dos fatos reais. O original contem diversos
mapas relevantes ao período.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una presentazione dei miti circa la guerra
1948, accanto ai fatti reali. Il documento contiene parecchi 
programmi relativi al periodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια παρουσίαση των μύθων για τον πόλεμο 
του 1948, παράλληλα με τα πραγματικά γεγονότα. Το έγγραφο
περιέχει διάφορους χάρτες σχετικούς με την περίοδο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una presentación de los mitos sobre la 
guerra 1948, junto a los hechos reales. El documento contiene 
varias correspondencias relevantes al período.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arabische israelische $überschneidung</string>
